name: Bouncer the Beach Ball
description:
Bouncer the Beach Ball will have you bouncing out of your chair and into your television set as you explore the strange bounce-house that Bouncer is trapped in! Bounce up, down, off walls, and even UPSIDE DOWN as you explore each of 7 short, hand crafted levels! Can YOU help him escape?

-----------Download:------------

This game can be bought completely free of charge, but any amount of payment is much, MUCH appreciated!

Download can be found below the Controls and Credits.

-----------Controls:------------

A/D - Hold to move left and right

W - Hold to jump

S - Hold to dampen your bounce

F - Toggle Fullscreen

M - Toggle music

V - Toggle screen-warp

-----------Credits:------------

Created by - Adam "PixelDough" Worrell

Sound by - Lily "MasterSquiddie" Price

Music by - Adam "PixelDough" Worrell

Awesome Box Art - Lily "MasterSquiddie" Price

Made in Gamemaker Studio 2
